banner.copy.before: We use cookies for technical, analytics and advertising purposes. You can accept all, reject, or adjust your preferences. More info in our
modal.title: Cookie preferences
modal.subtitle: Control which categories you allow. You can change these at any time.
categories.necessary.title: Necessary
categories.necessary.desc: Required for the site to work (security, session, load balancing).
categories.analytics.title: Analytics
categories.analytics.desc: Helps us measure site usage (e.g., Google Analytics 4).
categories.advertising.title: Advertising
categories.advertising.desc: Allows ad personalisation and campaign measurement (Google Ads, remarketing).
categories.functional.title: Functional
floating.manage.label: Manage cookies
